short_summary: Loader \/ Riding Mountain National Park\/ MB \/ Parks Canada Agency
description: Loader \/ Riding Mountain National Park, MB \/ Parks Canada Agency5P420-22-0044\/BAdam TanTelephone: 587-436-5793Email: adam.tan@pc.gc.caParks Canada Agency has a requirement for one (1) Loader.This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18LOAD\/A. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https:\/\/buyandsell.gc.ca\/procurement-data\/tender-notice\/PW-HS-644-75242.As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days.The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is October 31, 2022.------------------------------------------------------------Reissue of Bid SolicitationThis bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 5P420-22-0044\/A, dated August 5, 2022 with a closing of August 23, 2022 at 14:00 MDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.DebriefingsBidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone or in person.
